description: These emotes, on the other hand, have their arms down to signal their defeat. It looks like they are hanging their heads, too, as if shrinking in size. Whatever cause they were fighting for, they are drained from the effort and have given up. Their sad mouths make it look like they are definitely not happy about it, either.  ┌（-.-)┐ ╭✬⌢✬╮ ……┌┤´д`├┐
title: Arms Down
